data.title: Johnny Friday

data.text:
Johnny Friday was a pimp, killed by Charlie Parker.

Physical description[]

Johnny Friday was a tall, thin, black man with slicked back hair. He had slitted eyes and was described as snake-like. He usually wore dark, three-button suits and collarless shirts[1].

Biography[]

Johnny Friday would kidnap young new arrivals for his stables from bus stations in New York by offering them soup laced with drugs. He would also supply children to pedophiles and dealt with pornographic material of a similar nature[1].
